summary.label:
PAYCONIQ MOBILE PAYMENT: FAST, CONVENIENT, SECURE & FREE 
 
Payconiq is a free App that enables you:
- to pay in stores, your bills, in other Apps, in online shops across the Benelux,
- to send, receive and request money to and from any phone number, with transfers via the underlying bank account(s). 
 
- Quick & convenient
- Free (except mobile operator charges)
- Transfers and payments from € 0.01 up to € 2,500 
- Highly secure & set your own payment limits
- Send and request money to/from any mobile number - with underlying bank transfer
- Works for most Luxembourg bank accounts/customers
- Available in hundreds of stores and with many (utility) bill issuers 

* A BANK PAYMENT APP
 
The BGL BNP Paribas Payconiq App is linked both to your phone number and your bank account(s). It meets banking-grade security standards; all payments are authorised with your biometrics or your PIN Code. You can set your security limits according to your preferences (default: EUR 2,500). Payments are made using (SEPA) bank transfer (funds may only be available the next working day). 
 
* QUICK ACTIVATION
 
To start using the App right away, all you have to do is to link it to your bank account. Launch the App and you’ll be guided through the process, it’s fairly easy. 
 
* SEND, RECEIVE & REQUEST MONEY
 
Payconiq is by far the fastest way to transfer money between two people. Choose the recipient’s phone number from your address book, type in the amount, authorise the payment and a SMS/push message is sent to the recipient. If the recipient has already activated Payconiq, the operation is triggered immediately, and if not, a SMS message is send out inviting the recipient to subscribe. Once he/she has activated Payconiq, funds will be transferred into the recipient’s bank account. 
 
Request money from any phone number: the most convenient way to get paid back by your friends, family or colleagues. Simply choose their phone number, type in the amount and they’ll get the request. You’ll receive a notification once they have made the requested payment. 
 
* IN STORE PAYMENT WITH PAYCONIQ QR CODES
 
Truly contactless payments with Payconiq QR codes: launch the Payconiq App, scan the Payconiq QR code and the amount to pay is automatically displayed on your phone. Validate the payment with your biometrics/PIN Code and you’re done.

* BILL PAYMENT WITH QR CODES
 
The quickest way to pay the bills: launch the App, scan the Payconiq QR Code on the bill, confirm the payment and you’re done, typically in less than 10 seconds. It works with your insurance and energy bills, with your telecom and public sector/municipality invoices provided Payconiq payments are accepted. 
 
Feel free to use it at Payconiq partner restaurants as well: no need to wait for the payment terminal, just scan the QR Code on the bill. You may even add a tip and then just leave right away. 
 
* PAYMENT IN OTHER APPS & IN ONLINE STORES
 
Top up your kid’s Restopolis account or use Payconiq on selected web sites: it is the most secure and the most convenient way to pay by clicking on the Payconiq button in the App/web site or in the web store. No card or bank data is transferred and nobody else can use your Payconiq App as all payments are authorised via fingerprint/PIN Code.

The free and easy solution to share your expenses with others. Create or check your tricount now to add your expenses.

Used by millions of people because short reckonings make long friends :-)!

Very practical for holidays, housesharing, events, couples evenings, etc.

KEY FEATURES:

• A clean and simple interface.
• If you want, share accounts with a group: everyone will see them and can add their own expenses.
• Divide expenses unevenly: good for travelling with couples or children, for example.
• Works with the app and online: accounts are visible in the app, but also online!
• Works offline to ensure perfect use in every part of the world... even on the beach!
• You can turn on notifications to see if others are adding or editing expenses, and link your tricount list to your email address.

WHAT USERS SAY:

"The best expenses app I've ever downloaded. The app is very intuitive" - Michael P.
"Makes sharing bills with friends so much easier, many useful options, an absolute must have." - Tom C.
"Super useful - my flatmates and I can't live without it anymore!" Sarah P.

THEY RECOMMEND TRICOUNT :

FORBES:
"With Tricount, you can create a group expense report on your phone. It tracks spending by person, and then splits up how much each individual owes or is owed from the total balance. When you’re ready to share the final breakdown, the app sends each person a link to Tricount’s site to review the data."

BUSINESS INSIDER:
"Next time you organize a group activity, Tricount will split up the expenses for you".

ABOUT IN-APP PURCHASES

As of version 2.1, Tricount offers in-App purchase subscriptions valid for one year. 

The price of the subscription is 6.99€ (Premium) and may depend on your territory and is clearly indicated on the subscription page. Payment will be directly charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. The subscription renewal costs the same price as the one of the original subscription. After purchase, you can disable auto-renewal in your user's Account Settings. Note that no cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Tricount's terms and conditions are available at https://tricount.com/en/terms

HOW IT WORKS:

create a tricount, share your link with friends ... et voilà!

Tricount makes sorting out and divvying your group expenses very easy when you organize activities (for example: ski trip, citytrip, holidays with a classroom, flatmates etc.)

Gone are the days of the old excel file: an easier and effective solution exists to breakdown the costs, sharing expense reports, list tickets and spending. Tricount does the accounting and balances the cost for your group expenses.

It lets you breakdown the budget of a group and track expenses during a trip or any occasion with friends. It can be used by couples, between colleagues, roommates & flatmates. It is a simple yet powerful tool to figure out who owes what to whom and balance spendings : I owe you, you owe me (IOU) ... so easy!

Create your group expenses on your mobile (even offline), during your group activity. Send everyone the link (a la Doodle), and your friends too can add their own expense or see your changes.

Tricount then tells you who should pay what to whom to balance the group.

Information about cookies
The Capitol app uses Firebase Cloud Messaging to send messages to its users. It is essential to secure transactions with Strong Customer Authentication (SCA) using in-app notifications. To do so, it sends a previously generated anonymous Firebase Installation ID (FID) to Google so that we can identify app users and send them messages related to SCA purposes. The installation ID is stored on your device’s keychain secure place as strictly necessary to provide the services, and is removed when the app is uninstalled. In addition to the mandatory SCA notifications, the FID will also be used as strictly necessary for optional notifications you may ask for within the app. Information on the functionality of Cloud Messaging is available under https://firebase.google.com/products/cloud-messaging/.

POSTPAID

- pogledaš svoje aktivne dodatke
- iskoristiš dostupne promocije 
- obaviš plaćanje svog računa
- obnoviš ugovor

PREPAID

- u svakom trenutku da proveriš stanje kredita

- kupiš dodatak u skladu sa svojim potrebama
- pogledaš svoje aktivne dodatke

PREUZMI MOJ A1 APLIKACIJU I BIRAJ POKLON DODATKE TOKOM CELE GODINE
Kao znak zahvalnosti i dobrodošlice, A1 ti donosi i posebna iznenađenja. U Moj A1 aplikaciji čekaju te poklon dodaci koje možeš da iskoristiš do kraja 2021. godine. 

POGODNOSTI
Uz Moj A1 aplikaciju možeš da ispratiš sve nove promocije i aktiviraš sjajne pogodnosti koje imaš u A1, kao i odlične ponude naših partnera za kupovinu raznih proizvoda i usluga.

PRONAĐI NAJBLIŽU A1 PRODAVNICU
U Moj A1 lako pronađi najbližu A1 lokaciju na mapi i poseti nas na jednom od A1 prodajnih mesta širom Srbije. 

PODRŠKA
Pripremili smo i sekciju sa pregledom najčešće postavljenih pitanja, kako bi u Moj A1 aplikaciji brzo pronašao odgovor na svako tvoje pitanje u vezi sa aplikacijom, a uvek nas možeš pozvati i putem Korisničkog servisa.

OD TEBE POČINJE
Zakoračimo zajedno u novo poglavlje gde svako ima mogućnost da započne nešto drugačije, a 1 pravi razliku. 

NAPOMENA: 
Vip nastavlja priču kao A1, zbog toga preporučujemo postojećim korisnicima Moj Vip aplikacije da ažuriraju svoju aplikaciju kako bi sve funkcionalnosti bile u potpunosti dostupne prilikom prelaska na Moj A1 aplikaciju.

Protok podataka preko A1 mreže nastao pristupanjem sadržajima u okviru aplikacije u nacionalnom saobraćaju se ne naplaćuje. Tokom korišćenja, moguće je da aplikacija pristupa eksternim sadržajima čije se korišćenje naplaćuje prema važećem A1 cenovniku.
